title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL & BIO-ENVIRONMENTAL  ENGINEERING/TECH
de_requirements:
The general entry requirement for the HND programme includes

1.       ﻿1. All the requirement for admission into the ND Agric and Bio-environmental Engineering Technology

2.       ﻿2. A minimum of lower credit pass (CGPA 2.50 and above) in the ND Agric and Bio-environmental Engineering Technology

3. A minimum of one year post ND cognate work experience, Where a candidate has a pass, he shall have not less than three (3) years of cognate work experience.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any two (2) of the following: Biology/Agricultural Science Chemistry Technical Drawing Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity Auto Mechanics Metal Work Further Mathematics Food and Nutrition Geography
subjects: Mathematics and Physics/Technical Drawing, Chemistry or any two (2) Science subjects.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ANIMAL HEALTH & PRODUCTION TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Candidates with qualifications as listed below shall be considered for admissions into the programme:

1.       ﻿1. The minimum entry requirements for ND programme in Animal Health and Production Technology.

2.       ﻿2. National Diploma in Animal Health and Production Technology only with (CGPA 2,50 and above).

3.       ﻿3. A minimum of one year Post-National Diploma cognate work experience where a candidate has a minimum of lower credit. Where a candidate has a pass, he shall have not less than three (3) years of cognate work experience.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following: Geography, Food and Nutrition, Economics, Technical Drawing, English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Nigerian Language, Home Economics. At least ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Candidates with qualifications as listed below shall be considered for admissions into the programme:

1.       ﻿1. The minimum entry requirements for ND programme in Building Technology.

2.      ﻿2.  National Diploma in Building Technology only with (CGPA 2.50 and above).

3.     ﻿3.  A minimum of one year Post-National Diploma cognate work experience where a candidate has a minimum of lower credit. Where a candidate has a pass, he shall have not less than three (3) years of cognate work experience.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any three (3) of the following: Economics/Commerce, Technical Drawing/Fine Art, Chemistry, Geography, Further Mathematics Woodwork, Biology, Religious Knowledge, Metal Work, And at least a credit pass in English Language is Compulsory. A pass in Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Use of English, Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
The general entry requirement for HND in Business Administration and Management are;

1.       ﻿1. All the requirement for admission into ND programme in BAM

2.      ﻿2.  A minimum of lower credit pass (CGPA 2.50 and above) in ND Business Studies or related programme

3.       ﻿3. A minimum of one year post-ND cognate work experience
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following: Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English Geography Office Practice Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Candidates with qualifications as listed below shall be considered for admissions into the programme:

1.       ﻿1. The minimum entry requirements for ND programme in Civil Engineering Technology.

2.       ﻿2. National Diploma in Civil Enginnering Technology only with (CGPA 2.50 and Above).

3.       ﻿3. A minimum of one year Post-National Diploma cognate work experience where a candidate has a minimum of lower credit. Where a candidate has a pass, he shall have not less than three (3) years of cognate work experience.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from: Biology/Agricultural Science Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity, Auto Mechanics, Metal Work, Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology, Further Mathematics English Language, Geography, Economics/Commerce. For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required. At least ‘O’ level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
The general entry requirement for the HND programme includes

1.       ﻿1.All the requirement for admission into the ND Computer Engineering programme

2.      ﻿2.  A minimum of lower credit pass (CGPA 2.50 and above) in the ND examination in Electrical/ Electronic Engineering Technology

3.       ﻿3. A minimum of one year post ND cognate work experience
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from: Biology/Agricultural Science Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity, Auto Mechanics, Metal Work, Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.), Further Mathematics English Language, Geography, Economics/Commerce. For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required. ‘O’ level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
The general entry requirement for the HND programme includes

1.       ﻿1. All the requirement for admission into the ND Electrical/ Electronic Engineering Technology programme

2.       ﻿2. A minimum of lower credit pass (CGPA 2.50 and above) in the ND examination in Electrical/ Electronic Engineering Technology

3.      ﻿3.  A minimum of one year post ND cognate work experience
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from: Biology/Agricultural Science Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity, Auto Mechanics, Metal Work, Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.), Further Mathematics English Language, Geography, Economics/Commerce. For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. ‘O’ level pass in Biology is required. At least ‘O’ level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: OFFICE TECHNOLOGY & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) of the following: Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand
subjects:
Any three (3) of: 
1. Mathematics
2. Economics
3. Commerce
4. History/Govt.
5. Geography
6. CRS/IS
7. Principles   of 
     Accounts.

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: A candidate for Higher National Diploma programme in Public Administration must be a holder of an accredited ND in Public Administration or any other equivalent qualification approved by NBTE. Such a Candidate must have obtained a (CGPA 2.50 and above). In addition, the candidate must have completed at least one year post-ND cognate work experience. It is also essential that such a candidate have also met the entry requirement for admission into ND Public Administration programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects of the following Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English Geography, Office Practice Government, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics,

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Basic Science and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics are compulsory.
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics
